DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot prospective randomize control trial compare initiation labor epidural analgesia combine spinal epidural vs. epidural influence risk postpartum depression symptom . Investigators randomize woman receipt CSE E labor , measure baseline psychological , psychosocial , psychophysical factor relate pain depression . The immediate research goal understand whether association labor pain PPD modifiable use tailor anesthetic technique .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous ( prior childbirth ) Singleton gestation Third trimester Healthy pregnancy English proficiency ( survey validate English ) Planned vaginal delivery Planning use labor epidural analgesia Term delivery ( > /= 37.0 week ) Severe maternal disease Severe fetal disease Delivery term ( delivery prior 37.0 week ) Contraindications neuraxial anesthesia know time enrollment Cesarean delivery WITHOUT labor Planning list infant adoption Did receive epidural analgesia ( either CSE E ) labor
